about.title: Hello, I'm
about.subtitle: Web Developer & Linux and Information Security Specialist

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content1: I started my journey in the world of technology more than 10 years ago, where I was interested in Linux systems and how they work. Over time, my skills evolved to include web development and information security.
aboutMe.content2: I currently work as an information security consultant and freelance web developer, helping companies build secure and efficient systems. I also provide training courses in Linux and information security.
aboutMe.content3: I believe in the importance of sharing knowledge, so I write technical articles on my blog and contribute to open source projects. My goal is to help others learn technology and develop their skills.
